## DataViewMeasureValue.isValid() method

Returns a boolean that is true if this value is valid and false otherwise. A value can be invalid if it cannot be computed for instance due to missing/invalid data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isValid(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
